name: CDiffInfectionTestsForCDiffToxinByEIA
title: C. diff infection (Tests for C diff Toxin by EIA)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of C diff Toxin by EIA),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: C diff Toxin by EIA),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
